content: finished measurements 14 from top of head to base of body hooks & notions us size i-9 5 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle 3 removable stitch markers in different colors 10 mm safety eyes small amount of smooth yarn in black like premier® anti-pilling everyday skills/techniques used in this pattern chain and single_crochet stitches single_crochet 2 stitches together seaming stuffing and attaching safety eyes pattern notes the pieces are worked in a spiral do not join at the end of rounds use a removable stitch marker to mark the first stitch of the round and move the marker up with each subsequent round as shown each section of a bunny uses a different section of parfait® chunky fruits for a similar look start each piece with a new color of the yarn each bunny took about 200g of yarn or one ball we recommend two balls of parfait® chunky fruits because the colors are cherry-picked for each component of a bunny
